headline: Gearing Up for The Big Game: WeShop Announces Electronics Offerings with Best Buy, Samsung, Lenovo and eBay
summary: NEW YORK, Jan. 28, 2026 (GLOBE NEWSWIRE) -- WeShop Holdings Limited (“WeShop” or the “Company”) (NASDAQ: WSHP), the world’s first community-owned social commerce platform, today announced retail partnerships with Best Buy, Samsung, Lenovo and eBay, enhancing its electronics offerings and giving shoppers even more ways to shop as demand for new televisions surges ahead of the Big Game. content.title: Gearing Up for The Big Game: WeShop Announces Electronics Offerings with Best Buy, Samsung, Lenovo and eBay
content.summary: NEW YORK, Jan. 28, 2026 (GLOBE NEWSWIRE) -- WeShop Holdings Limited (“WeShop” or the “Company”) (NASDAQ: WSHP), the world’s first community-owned social commerce platform, today announced retail partnerships with Best Buy, Samsung, Lenovo and eBay, enhancing its electronics offerings and giving shoppers even more ways to shop as demand for new televisions surges ahead of the Big Game.
